name: Kinect Sports: Ultimate Collection
summary: Finally, you don't have to choose! This ultimate collection hast two best-selling Kinect games wrapped into one - putting 13 great sporting games at your fingertips. So grab your friends and compete for a personal best or jump in and out of the action in team Party Mode! Anyone can play in these controller-free, full-body sports games. With your body as the controller, nothing comes between you and the action!
